message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to pay $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference at $110?  I'm willing to be flexible to reach an agreement.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, I would like to stick to my original budget of $100. I hope you can meet me halfway.
